thread.title: BRIEF-Pangen Biotech to issue 2nd series convertible bonds worth 18 bln won

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pangen Biotech to issue 2nd series convertible bonds worth 18 bln won
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - Pangen Biotech Inc :
* Says it will issue 2nd series unregistered and unsecured private convertible bonds, to raise 18 billion won in proceeds for operations and investment
* Maturity date is Feb. 21, 2023, coupon rate is 0 percent and yield to maturity is 1 percent for the bonds
* Conversion price is 17,295 won/share and conversion ratio is 100 percent
Source text in Korean: goo.gl/Jdo16d
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
